prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a vibrant blue body.
Show me an amphibious Pokemon that has orange accents and a powerful stance.
Imagine a creature that thrives in wetlands, showcasing a mix of blue and orange hues.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a large, confident swimmer with unique features.
Design a sturdy Pokemon with a blend of aquatic and terrestrial traits.
Give me a Pokemon that can traverse both land and water with ease.
Make a creature that embodies strength and agility, perfect for battling in various terrains.
